effect.text: Discard 1 Energy card attached to 1 of your own Pokémon in order to remove up to 4 damage counters from that Pokémon.

cost.description: Discard 1 Energy card from one of your Pokemon

requirements.description: At least one of your Pokemon must have Energy attached
Must have at least one Pokemon with damage counters

tips: Only include in decks with reliable Energy generation or recovery
Best used on Pokemon that have more Energy than needed for their attack
Calculate if the healing extends survival enough to justify the Energy loss
Excellent in Rain Dance and Energy Trans decks
Consider discarding Energy types you have in excess rather than needed colors
Avoid using in Haymaker or other aggressive decks - Energy is too precious

rulings.ruling: You must discard exactly 1 Energy card attached to one of your Pokemon to play Super Potion
The Energy can be discarded from any of your Pokemon, not just the one being healed
Remove up to 4 damage counters (40 damage) from the Pokemon
If the Pokemon has fewer than 4 damage counters, remove all of them
You can discard any type of Energy card (Basic Energy or Special Energy like Double Colorless Energy)
You cannot play Super Potion if none of your Pokemon have any Energy attached
The Pokemon being healed can be your Active Pokemon or any Benched Pokemon
You must have at least one Pokemon with Energy attached to play this card
